nodes.text: Shawn Lovette is a layout artist for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that is planned to air in Fall of 2008 as a continuation of the animated Star Wars: Clone Wars series that was shown on Cartoon Network in 2003.

His first digital animation project went on to win two Emmy Awards for "Best Specialty Graphics", awarded to Digital Dimension, the visual effects studio Shawn Lovette was lead designer for at the time. He worked as a lighting technical director for Cats & Dogs (2001), a visual effect surveyor for Juwanna Mann (2002), a previs artist for Superman Returns (2006) and Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby (2006), and motion performance lead for Happy Feet (2006).
